Package gamecomponents.places

Class VaccineClinic

java.lang.Object
display.GameComponent
gamecomponents.places.Place
gamecomponents.places.VaccineClinic
public class VaccineClinic
extends Place
The VaccineClinic represents a Place that vaccinates people. It can hold a maximum of 5 patients at a time and can have at most 1 Researcher. The VaccineClinic takes 15 seconds to "make the vaccine" after it is opened.
Author:
Felicia Zhang

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    VaccineClinic​(java.util.ArrayList<Location> locs)
    Creates a VaccineClinic at certain locations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean addPerson​(Person p)
    Admits a patient to the VaccineClinic, a Person that is not a Doctor, Player, or Researcher can only be admitted if the clinic is not at its full capacity of 5 people.
    void draw​(processing.core.PApplet marker, Tier t)
    Draws the VaccineClinic in the given Tier, the VaccineClinic shows that number of researches it currently has if it is not open.
    void setDisabled​(boolean b)
    Sets the disabled status of the VaccineClinic

  • Constructor Details

    • VaccineClinic

      public VaccineClinic​(java.util.ArrayList<Location> locs)
      Creates a VaccineClinic at certain locations. The clinic is open and does not have a researcher.
      Parameters:
      locs - the ArrayList of Location objects the VaccineClinic occupies

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw​(processing.core.PApplet marker, Tier t)
      Draws the VaccineClinic in the given Tier, the VaccineClinic shows that number of researches it currently has if it is not open. The VaccineClinic also removes a patient that has stayed at the clinic for at least 15 seconds. if it is open, the VaccineClinic displays the word open
      Overrides:
      draw in class Place
      Parameters:
      marker - the PApplet surface on which the VaccineClinic is being drawn
      t - the Tier in which the VaccineClinic is inside
      Precondition:
      this method runs with the conditions previously set on the given PApplet

    • addPerson

      public boolean addPerson​(Person p)
      Admits a patient to the VaccineClinic, a Person that is not a Doctor, Player, or Researcher can only be admitted if the clinic is not at its full capacity of 5 people. Only 1 Researcher can be admitted to a clinic.
      Parameters:
      p - the Person that wants to be admitted to the VaccineClinic
      Returns:
      whether or not the patient was admitted to the VaccineClinic

    • setDisabled

      public void setDisabled​(boolean b)
      Sets the disabled status of the VaccineClinic
      Parameters:
      b - the new status of the VaccineClinic, true means the clinic is now disabled
